title: Food-Free at Last: How I Learned to Eat Air
description: Get the Monkey Off Your BackFood is a drug. Break the shackles of addiction and learn to eat air! In this detailed guide, Dr. Robert Jones, MD, PhD, DDS, ODD gives you the practical, step-by-step advice you need to transition to the air-only diet.Also in This Groundbreaking Diet Book: * Lunge and Chomp -- Learn the Secrets of Air-Eating Technique! * The Twelve Steps to Food Freedom -- Anyone Can Do It! * The Hidden Menace in Our Society That Can Prevent You From Eating Air -- and How We as a Nation Can Overcome It!
author: Robert           Jones
